nodes.description: Improvised explosive device detonates on a bridge in Gamboru, killing at least 30 people.
nodes.support_text: at least 30 people were killed in the northeastern Nigerian state of Borno after an improvised explosive device detonated on a bridge, sources told Reuters on Monday.

nodes.description: Eyewitness reports describe a loud explosion and multiple casualties.
nodes.support_text: Witnesses in the market town said more than 35 injured people were taken to the local hospital following the attack.

nodes.description: More than 35 injured people are taken to the local hospital.
nodes.support_text: more than 35 injured people were taken to the local hospital.

nodes.description: Military spokesman confirms he will provide comment later in the evening.
nodes.support_text: A military spokesman said he would provide comment later in the evening.

nodes.description: Two CJTF sources confirm the attack and early death toll estimates.
nodes.support_text: Two sources with the Civilian Joint Task Force, a group of citizens formed to fight Boko Haram, confirmed the attack and the early death toll estimates.

nodes.description: No group immediately claims responsibility for the attack.
消息来源向路透社报告
nodes.support_text: after an improvised explosive device detonated on a bridge, sources told Reuters on Monday
语义描述：意识到同事朋友伤亡；主体：I；对象：many friends and colleagues were killed
